name: MaryJane Panullo
review_text: So happy with my new Kerrigan. Had a different model for years now love this new one. It has more features than my other one which are very helpful! The taste of coffee is great and you can even adjust for strong!
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: VS
review_text: I have used a Keurig machine with buttons without a display for years.  It had its problems not dispensing the correct amount of water. I contacted customer service several times to troubleshoot and it would work for a bit and dispense the correct amount of water and the battle went on for 5 years.  I decided to "update" the unit with this machine with a touch screen.  I've used it five times and the display screen is black and will not illuminate even after unplugging.  Needless to say you need the screen to use the unit.  Keurig, why did I let you suck me in again?:(
review_title: Display stopped working after five uses!
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Cathy Jackson
review_text: This was a replacement for the one that quit working after 5 yrs. I love the improvements. I love iced coffee and this one is so much easier to go from a 4oz iced coffee (over ice) to a 10oz hot coffee or even a carafe. It's a little noisier than my last one, but hey, a great cup of coffee has it's price. And this coffee maker is worth it!
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Avid Reader
review_text: Once I got the right brewing combination of settings (8-10 oz on "strong") and K-Cup K-carafe pods, I have my perfect cup of coffee every time!  Worth the money for the initial expense for the machine/accessories.  We are actually saving money not having to buy pods, nor do we have the waste of used pods going to a landfill.  The grounds are put in a composting system and back into the earth.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Robert B.
review_text: This is not a good Keurig brewer. This is my third Keurig brewer and the worst of the three, especially for the price. The needle clogs almost daily and must be cleaned. Worst of all it ruins a k-cup of my favorite Donut Shop coffee. I would not recommend this machine. Very disappointing.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Johanna
review_text: This lasted exactly one year to the first time I purchased it the program started to go out and now it is blank this is not worth the money I had the older model k145 I purchased two years ago and I cleaned it and set it up hopefully this will work for a while until I can get another but it will not be a keurig very disappointing for a coffee machine at $275.00
review_title: This will not last more than one year
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: NJD
review_text: This is the last Keurig I will ever buy.  This is the 4th one I have bought and have had nothing but trouble with them, they don't work half the time.  Unfortunately I did not keep the packaging and paper work so I just trashed it because all it would do is give an error message. I even checked with Keurig and go no where.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Cal
review_text: Display became unreadable in less than one month. We guess how many ounces from memory to brew a cup and can't reset any timing after unplugging and re-plugging to try and fix display. Would like to return for refund and buy machine that does not have digital display or computerized programmable feature. Was slow to preheat, may as well boil water on stove top. My Original Kuerig lasted me over 10 years. This was very disappointing purchase.
review_title: Digital display unreadable in less than 4 weeks....
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Julie F.
review_text: Works and looks great, my only complaint is the cord is wayyyy to short and will not reach the outlet at my business. Basically I had to place a box under it to reach the outlet and now it looks cheap instead of adding an extra bit of hospitality for my clients. I'm waiting for a K-Cup holder to arrive and hope it is tall enough to reach the outlet. Note to Keurig...please make your cords longer on future products.
review_title: Works and looks great, my only complaint is the cord is wayyyy ...
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Hazen
review_text: I really love these Keurig brewers when they work.  I received mine about two weeks ago and this morning, got the dreaded white/blank lcd screen.  Sending back and replacement on the way.  I wish I could still buy the brewers with the mechanical buttons.  I'm not sure if this company will ever get the lcd's to be reliable.
review_title: I'm trying hard to like these!
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Jim P.
review_text: I've only had this unit for about a week, but so far I love it. Not crazy about the idea of spending => $1 per cup of coffee, but I'll do it for the convenience of the thing. Takes much less time to start enjoying a cup of coffee than with my old drip system. And since I have a favorite local micro-roaster, I bought the My-K-Cup thingy so I can load it with coffee from there.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Betsy
review_text: I am very happy with this version. I purchased this after my Special Edition Keurig Machine (2012) began malfunctioning. This is easier to use and comes with a water filter. There is also a "strong" button so you can brew a stronger cup of coffee AND a hot water only button.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Brandi L Cardinal
review_text: This is my second Keurig but my first 2.0 model. I was thrilled to get it. Unfortunately the machine is no longer working correctly after just 7 months. Can t return it because the return period was only 2 months. A lot of money for a piece of junk. At the end of the cycle when the machine is supposed to blow a burst of air thru the pod to ensure all the liquid has been expelled, it does not. It just drips and leaked for three minutes afterwards and then I have to get a drippy pod with scalding liquid from the machine to the trash. Great way to wake up.
review_title: Too short return period. Stuck with a piece of junk.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: gears
review_text: Love it.  I'd purchase again.  Only con would be that I''ve got to clean needle more than I'd like but it keeps coffee very hot and you can choose to K-cups or can purchase separate single and carafe filters to use with regular bulk coffee.  Also have Carafe it's great for company.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Jay Taz Kuzara
review_text: Large display screen, 70 oz huge water reservoir, and low noise motor make this the perfect Keurig in my opinion. Great machine for people who don t have much time to brew and love a great tasting coffee. NOTE Coming in at just a little under 14" tall, this model is a little taller than those in the past so measure the area you want it to go.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: R Johnson
review_text: It has more choices in programing how you want to brew k-cup
review_title: I am about done with Keurig machines
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: LORETTA KING
review_text: So easy to setup and use. I am loving the fact I can change my coffee each day without wasting, adjust the strength and temperature of each cup. The automatic shutoff is nice too!
review_title: So easy to setup and use
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Slow Motion
review_text: It works.  Be sure to save the cleaning device.  Personally a three is as high as I am going to rate a Keurig due to not being able to turn off the filter reminder and not easy to program and having to refill too often--and basically do not like them.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Kimberly
review_text: Love this!  My son told me I'd be jealous when he moved here by me - he said I'd fall in love with his new Keurig - and he was right!  I ordered one for myself.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: S. Vargus
review_text: This machine was a total disaster!  I had a previous model for 4 or 5 years with absolutely no problems until it finally stopped working.  Tried two different models and neither one of them worked well consistently; however, this model spewed coffee grounds and hot water all over my counters at least 3 times and kept directing me to use the special gadget for cleaning the needles.  Kept giving me the "water pressure" problem message.  What a mess it made.  I'm totally off Keurigs now....apparently, they no longer make a quality product even though the prices have gone up significantly.
review_title: BIG DISAPPOINTMENT, VERY MESSY AND NOISY!
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Amazon Customer
review_text: It hasn't even been a year since we purchased this product and it is not working properly.  We have to run the 12 oz setting twice in order to get 12 oz of coffee in our mug.  The screen will show up garbled at times and cannot brew at all, since you need the touch screen to enter your settings to brew.  I am very disappointed as we had another keurig prior to this one that lasted four years.  It was still working, however we wanted another keurig that could brew 12 oz and that had a larger water chamber.  I would NOT recommend this product to anyone.
review_title: I am very disappointed as we had another keurig prior to this one ...
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Nathan R.
review_text: Brews great coffee when it works. Unfortunately, we started getting "Sorry, brew interrupted" after a month of use. I performed all of the troubleshooting, needle maintenance, etc., to no avail. Worked with tech support and had to repeat all troubleshooting steps, but the problem persisted. They sent me a replacement and recommended that we only use bottled water (even though I have a whole-home carbon filter and use the included in-tank filter).
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Patricia
review_text: Excellent product, arrived on time. I like the option to make a larger cup of coffee and the reason the I bought this. Most Kerrigan yep machines make small cubes of coffee not the normally large cups most are accustomed to drinking.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: hme013
review_text: I LOVE my Keurig. I know that there are a lot of mixed reviews online about Keurigs and incidents that have happened. However, I have never had a problem with one. Since I moved, I bought a new one and I absolutely love this one. I got the black, and it looks great on my counter. I've never had any issues with heating/turning on or off at all. It works great.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: dian
review_text: It looks very nice, however, it takes too long to preheat the water to make every cup. The one I had before made the coffee immediately. I would have returned it, but I did not keep the box. I will just deal with it.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Robert Consiglio
review_text: Had it for abt a month now. Make about 6-7 cups a day. Had 2 other key rigs before and they both had faults and stopped working after a year. This one seems very different and refined. Greatcoffeeandveryvery easy to use.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Jessica
review_text: Do not buy this from Amazon. I purchased this model and it would not let me get passed this initial set up phase. I ordered a replacement thinking it was defective. I received the new item today and it does the same thing, when I called Keurig they also couldn t troubleshoot the issue on either Brewer. Very disappointed and not going to go through amazon for this any longer
review_title: Very disappointed and not going to go through amazon for this ...
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Michelle Whidden
review_text: Bought this machine twice for my office, both times I kept receiving the same error.  Coffee grounds would clog up the needle and the water could not flow through.  I would clean out the needle and if lucky, could get one cup of coffee.  I thought it may be the coffee, bought a bad box of k-cups....I tried two other types of coffee and two types of tea.  The only k-cup that would not clog the needle was green tea.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Jes
review_text: I like this unit and it's saved me over $50 a month I normally spend at Starbucks and Dunkin Donuts!  Oh, well for them.  I will say making a 12 ounce cup of coffee isn't the easiest at a cup tall enough to fit that much coffee with cream barely fits or won't.  However, the unit works greats and is easy to maintain!  I really enjoy having it as it saves me money and time!
review_title: Good unit and it saves money over Starbucks and Dunkin Donuts
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Jan Brunkow
review_text: This is the first product review I have made even though I am an avid Amazon customer.  I bought this at the end o f December...nothing but trouble.. hours spent  checking Keurig website, and youtube to get the answer to coffee  ground in the coffee and wasted Keurig pods .  Have used cleaning device and unclogged both the needles multiple times....STILL not a good cup.  It also has a noisy pump ...
review_title: clogged needles and coffee grounds  in my cup.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Bob
review_text: This is our 3rd Keurig.  After a short period of time they start jamming up and you have to clean out all the debris and use a cleaning pod which may or may not work.  Had this one 4 months and after numerous cleans and wasting many K-cups (different brands were tried), it decided to just not work at all.  Do not buy.  Am going to try another brand, Oxx, and see how it does with the K-cups.  All in a all, just a frustrating experience with these machines.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Sylvia
review_text: Just made a k-cup of Wegmans store brand coffee that was on sale and it was almost drinkable without cream or sugar.  Big improvement over the coffee maker this will replace.  So far, fantastic!
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Nonalie
review_text: What do you do when your original Keurig dies and your employees productivity falls into rapid decline?  You thank your lucky stars you are a Prime member and shipping is fast and easy!  Transitioning from the "dinosaur" of machines to the Keurig K475 was a breeze as it still has the simple functionality with a few new bells and whistles from it's predecessor.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: E.N
review_text: I bought the Keurig K475 after my previous keurig stopped working after about 7 years.  At first I liked it and it worked like you would expect a keurig to work.  After about 3 weeks though, it started shorting itself out and shutting down randomly, and when it would turn back on, the clock had been reset.  It would sometimes even shut off in the middle of brewing a cup. Luckily, I was within Amazon s return period so I returned it for a new one.  Well, now it s about 6 weeks later, and the replacement unit has started doing the same thing!  I couldn t even get it to stay on long enough to make a cup of coffee before I left for work this morning. I wish I had never bought this!
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Paul
review_text: Screen keeps going white.  Have to unplug to reset it, works for a while then goes white again  Got new one and works great.  Now I know don't buy refurbished just get new one it's worth it.
review_title: Screen keeps going blank. got new one works great
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: LyonZ
review_text: Purchased in October as a Christmas gift.  Stopped working with water pressure error message in May.  Lasted only 5 months.  Still under factory warranty which Keurig took care of, but had to ship a piece on my dime as proof of retirement.  Crossing fingers for replacement.  From reading other reviews it appears the K475 is problematic.  Not good.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Keith R.
review_text: Screen stopped working after 1 week.  Add water light comes on when tank is just below half full requiring refills almost constantly.P
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Kerry K.
review_text: It lasted about three months before the on-board ROM failed. Fortunately, Kuerig sent a free replacement. Nonetheless I had no coffee maker for over a week.
review_title: Fortunately, Kuerig sent a free replacement
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: oohmomma
review_text: This coffee machine makes good coffee, looks really nice and that's it. The first machine I got was cracked. This must have happened at the factory because the box was perfect. Amazon sent another and it seems fine except for the fact that the coffee at the highest temp setting is only around 130 degrees. My Mr. Coffee maker that only cost $40 and makes good coffee and a lot hotter.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: K OBrien
review_text: So I m on my second Keurig  K475 coffee maker.  The first I ordered in November and shortly after that  the display window went out so you basically could not use any of the functions of the coffee maker.  I contacted amazon and they replaced it.  Unfortunately,  Now the same thing has happened to the replacement.  I can t believe this.  I ve used Keurig coffee makers for years but this is by far the worst I ve seen.  I would not recommend the K475 model to anyone. If it s happened to me twice I have to believe it s happening to lots of other buyers.
review_title: Display window on Keurig K475 keeps going out - worthless
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Amazon Customer
review_text: Needed our 4th Keuring and this is great! Still wish it held more water. Read the instructions as it uses Tap water. Also, do the weekly cleaning of the needle and there should be no problem.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Sunnylady6
review_text: This Keurig arrived my husband and I put it together it took quite a while it's very intricate we finally got it and we decided we're going to drink coffee well my husband doesn't really drink coffee and he had 3 cups in a row it is so good and I got the 40 PODS of coffee also. Having so much fun if you want good coffee take our advice this is great will enjoy it for days and months to come
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Grb
review_text: This is useless. Worked for 3 weeks then getting error message "water under pressure" clean according to Keurig, works for a day or so (maybe) with same issue.  Called Keurig they sent me a new one (same model line) worked for 3 days  quit again.  Not worth of money!
review_title: This is useless. Worked for 3 weeks then getting error message ...
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Amazon Customer
review_text: This is a great coffee maker. I had to replace my previous 2.0 and the upgrades are definitely there. Allowing for the carafe is great and definitely get the metal one with the donut shop coffee worth the price of admission. Love the strong setting and to be able to make it hotter.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: louise
review_text: Great brewer when it works: had to send it back due to display going blank. Keurig seemed to know all about it.  Even though they sent a new one out, that's my peeve about Keurig products.  A lot of them crap out.  I have several in my basement.  This was recommended by someone so I gambled.  Love it. Makes hot, strong coffee.  Hope it continues to work.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: no name
review_text: I purchased the first 1 at the end of March and it lasted 9 months.  The warranty is for 1 year so Keurig sent me a new one and it lasted a total of 3 days and it is doing the same thing as the first one.  Keurig only wants me to send a small piece back to them and the rest is suppose to go into the dump site - that means there would be 2 of these from me at the dump site - what a waste.  I had heard different stories about  how they don't last.  I guess I should have believed them.
review_title: Keurig only wants me to send a small piece back to them and the rest is suppose to go into the dump site - that means there would be 2 of these from me at the dump site - what a waste. I had heard different stories about how they ...
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Allston Lawwill
review_text: I bought this for my wife last Christmas. We upgraded from one of the older Keurig models. I was a little hesitant because of all of the features. In my opinion, the more gadgets it has, the more you have to worry about fixing. But we haven t had a single issue with this Keurig.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: oldfox
review_text: Only use select K cups w/ this machine, very pricey coffee.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Amazon Customer
review_text: Love the lid that flips half open so you don t have to take the lid completely off every single time you want to add more water. That was honestly the deciding factor. Plus the screen is high quality and it looks great. It s the perfect size; not too big and not too small.
review_title: Love the lid that flips half open so you don t ...
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Mature Lady
review_text: I loved it to start with, but after just 3 months I can't get it to turn on. The power indicator lights, but can't get the thing to start. Has anyone else had this problems?
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Mohammad H. Partovi
review_text: It had all kinds of problems.  I had to push the button 10 times and play around with the machine, just to get it to start!  I finally returned it.
review_title: It had all kinds of problems. I had to ...
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Author4God
review_text: Keurig evidently has a problem with the needle that punctures the pod. A few weeks after using it, I had to call because it kept saying water under pressure, despite having cleaned it repeatedly with the cleaning pod. Keurig needs to work on this flaw.
review_title: Keurig evidently has a problem with the needle that punctures ...
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Luke Orion
review_text: I'm still not sure the coffee is as good as from my drip machine or french press.  I use the best pods I can get but I don't think they can give a full flavor with the tiny amount of coffee in them.  It is convenient though.  Don't know if I like the waste concern.
review_title: Drinkable coffee from a decent machine.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: J. Wenger
review_text: Bought this in April but didn t technically start using it until mid June. Everything was great until today. The display started to fade on one side of the screen. I turned off and turned it on and now there is red,blue, green lines and no display.
review_title: Display not working after a month
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Keith Styles
review_text: It's mostly what I'd expect from Keurig.  What I didn't expect is to not get a full set of instructions and there was no cup included to add your own coffee.  BOOOOOO!!!!!
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: SMcClung
review_text: 3.5 stars. Makes good coffee, but it drips a lot after. Which would be fine with the drip tray, but I usually have the drip tray out to fit travel mugs beneath the coffee maker. So it's annoying and my previous model had no issues like that.
review_title: Drips a lot but otherwise good
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Ronda Helm-Hiestand
review_text: The display decided to crap out and not work.  It's very difficult to even brew a cup of coffee or tea.
review_title: The display decided to crap out and not work
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Greg H
review_text: So far unit works as designed...no issues as of yet...(about a month). Don't think the coffee is hot enough for my preference..even at the highest setting...but other than that..it's ahight...it brews coffee...it's a kuerig..what more can I say.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Steve B
review_text: Worked fine for 28 days then the digital display malfunctioned. After making a cup it shows it is ready but is overridden by the do not open message and the heating spinner all at the same time. Unplugged it and plugged it back in 15 minutes later but the same malfunction occurred after brewing a cup. I'm returning it tomorrow
review_title: Digital display malfunctions after only 28 days
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Andrea
review_text: Love this  Makes great coffee.  Bought the reusable filter and can use regular coffee in it.  Use PODs as well.  Easy to clean.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Carlos Fernandes
review_text: One of the worst Keurig products out there. It is complete garbage and it all boils down to the touch screen. It is awful and it does not work correctly. It will never respond to your touch. If you do not believe me just google, touch screen fix. I truly regret buying this machine. Do not make the same mistake I made. I avoid this touch screen model. I call in a warranty repair and the shipped me a replacement and the screen is super blurry and pixelated. It works to so I able to make my coffee, but such a poor product. Should have gone with just a regular button push model
review_title: Screen works for 2 months and it stops responding
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: RanMan
review_text: Using highest heat setting for coffee and not very hot ... cumbersome removal of k cup ..... not as good as my previous Keurig K Cup brewer ... VERY Disappointed.  lacking the quality Keurig was known for.  Will look for other Brand in the future.
review_title: not as good as my previous Keurig K Cup brewer
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Kitskis
review_text: Temperature control, brews a pot of coffee, default cup size, many cup sizes.  Tank doesn't require that the whole lid be removed to pour in water...
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: KayLynn
review_text: This Keurig is beautiful and makes a very good cup of coffee. We haven't purchased a carafe for it (sold separately) but we really like the cup size options and the strength options. The negative is that we like ours 12 oz and strong - this takes a loooooong time to brew and it is noisy. But with a little patience, you can have a great cup of coffee.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Nathanael Belch
review_text: This thing is fricken sweet! Different modes, one for even hot cocoa and to make it stronger! Different sizes whether you want anywhere from 6 - 12 ounces. Heats up in about 45 seconds and really matches the decor in an updated modern kitchen.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Donny Brook
review_text: First the not so good part:
review_title: Initial thoughts on the Keurig K475 after first two weeks of use.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: John
review_text: Needed a portable coffee machine for my downstairs office,  This thing was just what I was looking for!!!  Not to mention it dispenses hot water at the right temp for a perfect cup of tea!!!
review_title: Not to mention it dispenses hot water at the right temp for a perfect cup of tea
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Judith  La Pierre
review_text: This is my second Keurig coffee maker and I love them.  The new model is better looking and has added a 12 cup setting which I love. It also has a lift up feature on the water tank which is wonderful but I think they will improve this feature going forward because the latch that holds up the lid is a little flimsy. All and all I totally love my coffee maker!
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: LULU
review_text: Hands down the best thing we own.  Had a small issue, and Keurig took care of it instantly.  Best Customer Service ever.  Thanks
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: goldie86
review_text: Constant clogging resulting with coffee grounds in cup.  Frequently cleaning of needle as instructed with no improvement. Big disappointment considering had prior Keurig for 5 years with no problems.  Other issues also.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Paula M. Watters
review_text: I like that it has a 12 cup feature, however it takes an excessively long time to preheat, and is very noisy when it makes coffee.
review_title: I like that it has a 12 cup feature
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: James
review_text: The Keurig K475 offer's a lot of options to brew your coffee and that would be great if it worked. Less then 3 months and the brewer stopped working. You would have to unplug the machine wait 5 minutes an repeat until the screen clears. It has definitely convinced by not to buy electronics thru Amazon, it's a lot easier to return to a brick an mortor stores.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: KhaoticR
review_text: Upgraded to this from the basic Keurig. If you love strong coffee, this is the machine for you. Yes, it can be noisy (sucking water from the tank and heating it and throwing it in the pod) at times, but when it makes a great cup of coffee it is nothing that cannot be overlooked
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: A. Willow
review_text: When it worked I worked well.  Sadly it only worked for about 6 months, at which point the screen stopped working.  By 7 months it stopped brewing correctly.  This is my 3rd Keurig machine and sadly my last.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Recon
review_text: These run way too hot.  The temp control doesn t do much.  I wish it had more features for the price and wish it was taller for 12 oz travel mugs.

name: Mary Allowan
review_text: I felt this product needed to be returned but I had already made plans to be out of town for 2 weeks and when I got home time just got away from me.  Now here it is 5 days too late!!!  I've had a Keurig in the past and that's why I purchased another one when my first one was no longer any good, but this one is very inferior to my first one.  When we make a 12 cup of coffee the water drips all over, except into the cup where we want it to go.  When I make tea it gets full of tea grounds, so what do I do?  Mary Allowan - justmudd@live.com

review_text: Works well with everything I've tried except Cafe Escapes Chai Latte kcups. I never know if the 2.0 v475 will brew the chai correctly or if it'll brew enough to cover the bottom of the mug then stop and give me an error message that won't clear unless I remove the kcup. The chai kcup box lists Keurig on the front. Guess I'll have to go back to having chai at work in the commercial Keurig. Don't know if the other Cafe Escapes flavors are problematic. Will reread the instruction book to see if I missed anything.
review_title: Don't use the Cafe Escapes Chai Latte kcups in this model

review_text: Mine died after 14 months.  Workmanship is suspect.  Just refuses to turn on.  At least now I know the design life of the Keurig.

review_text: wonderful coffee maker...always tastes 'just right' and has neat features giving you choices that turn out better than manually measured ground coffee. The touch controls work fine and are easy to understand and manipulate.

Unfortunately, three more K-cups later and I had to strain it myself.  The next morning, same thing.  I knew they didn't last forever, but really??!!!  Five weeks and it breaks!  Not acceptable.

review_text: I've own a few different machines and have always upgraded based on features rather than product failure. This is by far the most 'high tech' of the lot and was simple to set up. name: ejh4isu
review_text: Worked great - when it worked.  I keep getting a "low water pressure" error and everything just stops, the manual is of no help.  Only choice is to send back to Amazon and try a new one.

name: Caren B.
review_text: Bought this for my husbands birthday and we absolutely love it!  We also bought the reusable k-cup coffee filter to use for our favorite coffee instead of buying individual k-cups which can be pricey.  We both use this several times a day.

name: Jason
review_text: It s a great brewer - love the strongest setting and the 12oz pour. However, less than three months after purchase, the touchscreen started malfunctioning - and went completely blank by month four, rendering the features unusable.  Keurig immediately offered to replace it, but intentionally sent the older K425 model to clear out back stock rather than replace with a new K475. The touchscreen is fancy but, functionally, is garbage and ruins an otherwise fine brewer. Customer support is dishonest.
review_title: Touchscreen broke in less than 3 months

name: Loisrae Mitchell
review_text: I love the way it works, and the convenience.  But, after using Keurigs at our daughter's home, and even at a condo on the beach, we are unhappy and confused because our coffee is too weak.  Yes, we set it for strong.  Has anyone else had this problem?
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: eddy
review_text: Love the large resivour and strong brew setting. A little confusing to setup but after that it was easy to use. Still don't know what the hot cocoa/tea button does. Wish these could be hard lined to a water supply.

product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: jb
review_text: Product arrived with what appears to be a common problem with these.  The screen goes blank and you can't use it until you unplug it and plug it back in.  After three blank screens in two days, I called customer support and they shipped another unit which arrived three days later.  It has been working fine for over a week but my wife doesn't like the delay (preheat) time between cups.  I'm also unhappy with the price.  I usually trust Amazon to be competitive but I just saw the same product at Walmart for about 25% less.
review_title: Product Below Average.  Customer Service Great. Price Too High.

name: Jennifer Peterson
review_text: Water pressure issues, stop brewing mid-cup...coffee grounds in the cup.  Have only used for 1 month.  Trying to return this item for a different version - our Keurigs typically last 2-3 years....this style barely over a month.
review_title: Defective I think - Refund or Replacement Requested.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: ClfLA

review_text: This machine is outstanding! Brew strength control is effective, and it accommodates both K-cup and "Cue" pods. name: Poolplayer
review_text: Ordered from Amazon and also ordered the San Francisco Bay Fog Chaser coffee.  The K475 was well packaged and looked like it was original factory packaging, however I was missing the "BONUS" 6 variety Kcup pack listed on the box?  Setup was easy and fast, the machine actually walks you through the first rinse/cleaning hot water function.  Popped a SFB Kcup in using high altitude setting, and the coffee was much stronger and better tasting (even at 12 ounces) than what I was getting from my prior Bunn MyCafe single cup brewer!  Good product, but minus a star for missing kcup variety sampler.
review_title: K475 - Easy setup and brews a good strong coffee, using San Francisco Bay Fog Chaser!

review_text: I was leery of getting this as I know a lot of people don't like the "lock out" that is built into it for cups that aren't licensed under Keurig.  I decided to go ahead and give it a try to replace my classic series brewer and was actually surprised in a good way.  I haven't had any issues with the k cups so far and the options that are on this are well above the classic.  You have more options for sizes, temperature, strength, though I'm not telling anything really new here as it does say that in the description.

review_text: Didn't work. The day I received it had problems. Grounds were everywhere in the machine, coffee, etc.  It was time-consuming and difficult to clean.  Thankfully Amazon accepted the return with no trouble.  I returned it after 3 days of this. name: Amazon Customer
review_text: Wish I had never purchased this Kuerig.  I bought it to replace/upgrade my K55 but had problems with Kuerig's own Green Mountain pods - keep getting a "water pressure" error message where I have to remove the pod and completely clean out the machine (has something to do with grounds getting stuck in the needles apparently).  Tried same pods again - which are not outdated - the expiration date is 2018 and same problem.  Tried other flavor Green Mountain, same problem and Folgers with same problem.  I have some Gloria Jean brand pods which work just fine in it!!  Called Kuerig and they sent me a whole new machine but same pods did same thing in new machine.  So, i bought a new box of Green Mountain (Kuerig's own brand) and they won't work either.  Totally frustrated with this machine, so now I have 2 with the same problem!  What's frustrating about it, is that I don't know which pods are going to work in it until I try one so I keep buying boxes to try.  Total waste of money, hate it.
review_title: I have some Gloria Jean brand pods which work just fine in it

name: Aaron B
review_text: So far OK. It is a Keurig brewer so you get the expected coffee. I bought this to upgrade my old Keurig Mini style brewer since I was tired of having to add water for every cup.The K475 has a nice big water reservoir but you actually have to fill it more often than every 70 oz since it always has quite a bit of water left when you have to refill. I have been having a bit of an issue with the k-cups I'm using though. They do have the colored ring for 2.0 support but it doesn't always get detected properly. Sometimes I have to lift the handle up, re-position the k-cup and then it will be detected just fine. I figured the easiest solution to the issue would just be using a Freedom Clip from Roger's Coffee Company but Keurig has defeated that. There is now a "wing" of plastic next to the Keurig DRM sensor which means that the Freedom Clip cannot be installed. As far as I can tell, that bit of plastic is there for no reason other than to stop you from being able to clip on something to defeat the DRM. I haven't yet tried anything else to defeat the DRM but I plan to at some point.
review_title: Brewer works well when the screen isn't all white but Keurig has taken steps to fortify their DRM protection.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Randal Ford
review_text: Years ago I had one of the earlier Keurig machines and had moved onto the Nespresso and pour overs.  On a whim, I decided to give Keurig a try again for the convenience (kids and early mornings :))  My first few cups tasted awful.  Horrible plastic smell and aftertaste.  I had already setup a return on amazon but before sending back did a bit of research about the smell.  This is very common.  Lots of people suggested running vinegar through it so I tried that.  It didn't help.  I eventually found a site that suggested running vodka through the machine to quickly rid quick rid of the plastic smell.  I thought, why not give it a try before sending back.  So I ran about half a bottle of vodka through the machine, then ran a full tank of water through the machine.  And just like that, the nasty plastic smell was gone.  Apparently, the reasoning is that the chemicals used to make the plastic during the production process are alcohol soluble.  So in essence, this cleaned the interior of the system and allowed for a much better cup of coffee.  I'm sure Keurig would never officially endorse something as crazy as pouring alcohol through the machine but it definitely worked.  I'm very happy with the machine now!  Hope this helps...
review_title: THIS is how to get rid of that nasty plastic smell and taste!
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: shris
review_text: Definitely no coffee snob here, but my husband is. This makes a weaker brew than the sludge he prefers, but it's perfect for me. Bought the MaxBrew reusable filters for the cup and the carafe at the same time after reading a coffee snob's review of both here, and I'm very pleased. I think the carafe, when it arrives, will even make it all even better. We buy whole beans at the grocery, various brands and medium-to-dark roast. We grind it in a Capresso burr grinder on the very finest setting. I have a 16 ounce cup and I brew 10 ounces on the strong setting, then sweeten it a bit. At this strength I don't have to cut it with milk anymore, just sweeten it a bit and I'm good to go. In our old drip coffee maker he'd brew a stronger pot and I'd *have* to make a latte. So I'm happy with this.
review_title: Brews a moderate cuppa, not too much fuss.

name: BJM
review_text: Keurig must have modified the K475 since it was released because the machine I bought recently does a great job brewing all of the coffee cups I had in my cabinet when my previous Keurig just stopped working.  I had also heard when the 2.0s came out that they would only brew the Green Mountain owned coffees so I realized I might be returning the K475 if that was still true. Since my other Keurig choices seemed to be to go back to the very simple machine or spend ridiculous amounts of money for one of the other pre-2.0 machines, I decided to give the K475 a try and am glad I did. I set the default to 6 oz. and strong; the coffee is as good if not better than it was using the previous machine. The touch pad controls are much smoother to use. My only concern is that there seems to be more that can break so I hope, at this point, Keurig has worked through any possible bugs in the control. Time will tell. In the meantime, anyone who wants coffee in my house can get the flavor or plain type that they prefer and I can still buy my favorite brands.
review_title: The latest K475 works really well

name: Kei
review_text: I JUST BOUGHT IT AND I LOVE IT.  I have been a Keurig fan for 20 years now.  My first baby finally died at 15 years old and I was loathe to have to buy the new one because the reviews are/were so mixed.  But lo and behold I had to give in and excused it by saying it is 'my Christmas gift to myself.'  I am pleased that I did.  Amazon ships in a few days and all of the bells and whistles did not come together.  I got this, the Carafe and Reusable Filter on three different days.  That was not a good look but hey I am now captain of a team.  I could've gotten it all together and cheaper at Wal Mart but Amazon comes with a warranty for Prime members and I love being Prime.  But I digress.  The Keurig itself came with the filter and 20 K cups and that was a pleasant surprise.  I have never gotten a filter for free.  The love the ergonomic design and the overall look of the maker.  It fits well with all my stainless steel appliances and other smaller appliances.  Looks good on the granite too.  I wish I had taken a pic.

review_text: Honestly, the coffee maker is fine, a little slower than my previous model but it's ok.  My problem is, I am unable to purchase a carafe to make my Keurig complete. Somebody could make a mint for themselves if they would start producing a carafe (thermal please) that will work in place of the Keurig carafe.  Somebody really dropped the ball on carafe production, nobody is getting rich now. Before anybody tries to help me by suggesting that I purchase the single serve pods, let me assure you, that's why I haven't returned this machine already.  If anybody knows a place to purchase the carafe today, I would really appreciate the information.  AMERICA FIRST!

review_text: I have had a few Keurigs in the past that have all worked fairly well...at least for a while.  This one is a lemon!  From the start, I cannot brew a cup of coffee without grounds entering my coffee cup.  I have used solid K-cups (normal ones), K-cups that are biodegradable (it's like they have a soft filter in the bottom instead of solid plastic), and Keurig Reusable K-cups.  In every case it get coffee grounds!  When using the solid K-cups, it frequently will not even finish the brew and error out. That's not a good way to start your day! Mine is going in the trash...what a waste.

review_text: Just for the convenience of brewing and never having to clean the machine, the Kuerig deserves 4 stars. However, once you find the k-cup brews you like, it makes a fine cup of coffee and that's worth 5 stars to me. Me-I'm a Starbucks snob...it seems to be the only coffee I really enjoy. I tried various methods at home including a french press to brew my coffee but never was very successful. The Kuerig solved my problems. From coffee to tea to hot chocolate to apple cider, I can have my choice by popping in a pod and pressing a button. Voila!
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Amazon Customer
review_text: Warning, do not buy this model. This was my first Keurig. It started clogging on the first day I got it. It will make straight coffee, just not any other hot drinks like cappuccino, hot chocolate, etc. My red flag should have been that it came with an attachment to unclog the pod holder. It will clog up, stop working, then you have to unclog, reset, wait. And before you know it, you don't even want a cup of coffee. My other mistake, is that the return date was only a few weeks, so unable to return it. So, now I am stuck with it. However, it's going to the burn pile today.

name: Josh in Kernville
review_text: Terrible product. Upon unpacking, we immediately noticed it was flimsy cheap plastic, and that for some reason the drip tray was designed to sit uselessly loosely, not in any way connected to the device. No big deal, if it had worked well. But after only three cups of coffee, it jammed and required using the needle cleaning device, wasting our time. Then it worked OK for about three days; then we tried to make a K-Cup Chai, and it jammed again. When I want my morning coffee, the last thing I want is to have to clean and repair a machine before I've had my coffee. Defeats the purpose.
review_title: Flimsy, jams easily, there are better products

name: Philoofwtx
review_text: I purchased this model for the single-serve function and ease of use with the touch-screen functions. This model 475plus is labeled a 2.0 model. Unsoftened water is not an option where this coffee maker is located, so I too have had many sessions practicing with the included maintenance cleaning tool as others have the very first day of use. I kind of expected this after reading some of the other reviews. All is not lost however, for two good reasons. First, my preferred method for brewing is grinding my own beans. I use an aftermarket and reuseable SoloPod K4 Chrome, which works well in the 475plus. Just make sure the box of the K4 indicates it is Keurig 2.0 compatible if your coffee maker is 2.0. Second, I am pleased to now know I will not be a significant contributor to K-cup kompost at the local landfill. There just may be a silver lining in almost everything that appears to have gone wrong after all!
review_title: It does what I want it to do
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: ELR
review_text: Can anyone tell me what is happening. I had my older keurig for years without a problem. Finally it just went out. Got a new 475 and immediately starting having issues. Throwing up the coffee grounds and messages. Mind you I only make 3-4 a WEEK! I called k company and they ran me through all these ridiculous rituals to get the machine clean and reset. Use paper clip to make hole on top (for pressure) . Push pod with thumbs to click into machine. Clean the needle by going up and down on handle 10 times every week. I use green mountain breakfast blend. It' never got better so ended up after a month sending it back. They sent me a replacement. Box says it's k400. Same looking unit as mine but they didn't send the water filter that goes into water or the thingy you use to clean maintenance machine. I've made 3 cups of coffee since yesterday and my third cup is again full of grounds of coffee. I ran a water alone cycle after this cup and it was full of grounds. I get message brew has been interrupted then open the top and pod looks like its exploded. Am I the only one this is happening to? I'm really hating the machine right now!!! Anyone has comments ?
review_title: It' never got better so ended up after a month sending it back

name: Brenda Frances Abdilla
review_text: I am no longer a Keurig fan. I was one of the early adapters to Keurig many years ago. My first machine was no problem for about 3 years (we brew 4-5 cups per day in our home). The second one lasted 3 months before it just died and they happily sent us a new one. That one lasted about 7 months before pooping out--by then I had learned the cheat (on utube) of using a paperclip to get rid of the grounds that get trapped. Our next one literally lasted ONE MONTH and they sent us a new, upgraded version and performs even worse--its wastes cups and does short pours and gets grounds in our coffee more often than not. The gal on the line said i have to clear the grounds and unplug and do the water bath thing every 5 cups. That is ridiculous. Clearly Keurig has lost quality in mass production. It's annoying. Not sure what machine I will try next but this is NOT working. The worse part if that we are filling the landfills with all of this plastic crap because they cannot get it right.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: radrttech
review_text: Google Keurig infested with ants. If you so much as ever get one ant in your home during spring, do not buy this machine. I had bought this to replace my old Keurig that had a water reservoir because this one had a carafe and an option for 12 oz. cups. After using this unit for 6 months, I noticed one day there were ants in the water reservoir. Upon further inspection I noticed there were hundreds of ants and their lave in there. When I started to try to clean the unit out, I found hundreds of them in the unit, in the tubes, etc. I have my home sprayed for ants, and hadn't seen any anywhere in my home, but this is not an isolated incident. Keurig is aware of the issues and will offer discounts or replacements to their owners. Apparently these machines are an ideal home because of their warm, moist environment. I never had this problem with my old unit, but the water was more secure in that system. I will never again purchase another Keurig product and this one is going in the trash.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Kathy&Ray
review_text: don't waste your time and money. this was purchased in June and as of today, we have had 3. The first one lasted about 4 weeks, then grounds poured into the coffee cup, the machine stops working and an error message is displayed. This usually occurs when you place a Kcup in and press the start button. The Kcup has been pierced, so you have to throw it away. When we called Keurig customer service, we were told to use a "paper clip" to clean out the needle, even though we had used the needle cleaning device, and purchased the descaling solution. When the machine still was inoperable, they sent us a replacement from Keurig. That machine lasted 2 weeks and all the above issues presented. We called and again were sent a replacement that worked for 3 days. Keurig insists it doesn't send reconditioned units as replacements. We have to drive a significant distance to the FedEx drop off. Add the days waiting for the replacement, Kcups ruined and unusable,save yourself the disappointment and aggravation. Sadly it made a great cup of coffee and tea, when it worked.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Blarney77
review_text: Yes, HOWEVER, We bought this fully intending to get a reusable filter we could make my wife's favorite coffee in and researched to find many different filters out there.
review_title: Makes great coffee and tea!  HOWEVER.....
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Devin Laughinghouse
review_text: I have bought two Keurig coffee machines over the past 3 years. My first one was very basic but did the job fine. When the 2.0 Keurigs came out I decided to upgrade. I wish I hadn t. I got the K475 (or K425, which is apparently the same) edition and it worked fine for the first year. The machine only had a year warranty as well. I kept a fresh water filter in the machine at all times and de-scaled it every 6 months. I also had an incidence where the piercing needle got clogged with coffee grinds and was able to use the appliance tool that came with it to resolve it. At about 18 months old the machine really began having problems. One day it just stopped dripping mid cup of coffee. With only an ounce or two in the cup with the selected 8 ounce cup option I was out of luck. After hard resetting the machine it still would only make a 5 second drip before stopping. The digital screen also remained frozen on please wait.. dispensing now for over 30 minutes. After no other choice I called Keurig today about the issue. After they helped me troubleshoot the problem they realized I needed a new Keurig machine. Since it was out of warranty of a year being at about 20 months old they told me the only thing they could offer me was 20% off a new brewer. Of course I could save more money by  downgrading to a cheaper brewer.  I stated that Target actually had a better deal on their Keurigs because they were discounted $10-20 off and you get a $20-25 target gift card when you purchase it. I also asked if I were to purchase through Keurig would I have an option to extend the warranty longer than a year but that is not an option. Target on the other hand offers a 2 year warranty for $9-11. Needless to say I bought the new Keurig from Target with the 2 year warranty. I guess you just have to get in mindset of buying a new Keurig every year or resort to the old Mr. Coffee drip pot.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: jrh1194
review_text: My wife gave me a Keurig K475 as a gift for Father's Day. This replaces my old Keurig which lasted almost 9 years. The K475 works great. I don't understand the other reviews that say you can only use 2.0 K-cups with the K475. I have used several differant k-cups left over from my old Keurig and they work just fine. It is not at all noisey, in fact it is quieter than my old one. I highly recommend the Keurig K475.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Shamiza
review_text: I love my keurig 2.0 k475 coffee maker. I received one free for testing and review from Influenster.com with all the bells and whistles, meaning it came with coffee of different brands and sizes, k-cups, k-mugs, k-carafe, teas and hot chocolates, p the carousel and the carafe. It was awesome!!!! It's easy to assemble and easy to use, the kids even make their own drinks. It has a touch screen that allows you choose different sizes for you hot drink, anywhere from 4ozs. to a carafe, so you can make it as strong or weak as you like, coffee for one or a group. My family absolutely love it, it has something for all of us. I only drink tea, the kids hot chocolate and others coffee and we can all use it. It's quick so you can have your hot drink in minutes. We have had it for a couple of months so far and no problem. Recommend.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: mary p
review_text: We've lived with this machine for 3 months now and I'm eager to replace it.  It is inconsistent in it's brewing... sometimes only making 1/2 of the 12 ounce cup I selected.  It also "locks up" frequently, with Pre-Heating showing perpetually with the spinning wheel of death.  The only way I've found to clear this is to actually unplug the unit and plug it back in.  Hope I can still get five bucks for it in my yard sale.
review_title: After 3 months I must downgrade this review * Big disappointment from previous model * Not 70 ounces
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Kathleen
review_text: I just setup my Keurig! So far, this is great! I upgraded from the original Keurig Mini due to the fact that this has a water reservoir, different brew sizes, the option to brew a carafe for multiple people etc. I like that it has a filter, which gives the water an even better taste for a cup of coffee, along with using filtered or bottled water (I never use tap water, as I have hard water). I set it up with the water filter, as well as put the reminder on to tell me when to change it, which is a nice little feature.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

name: Juan Underpar
review_text: This is my third Keurig machine and by far, it's the worst.  Constantly clogs causing the pump to work work work for 5 min trying to force water through, resulting in about 2 oz cup.  And it's not about flushing the system w white vinegar, which I do often.  It seems the pucks have a small amount of positive air pressure, so when the hollow needle pierces the top, a small amount of grounds are pushed up into the needle.  Over time, it causes a clog.  Have to jam a paper clip up into the needle to unclog.  BIG Big hassle.  Plus the stupid machine senses the type of K cup and restricts the size cup of coffee you can make.  I like a 12 oz cup from Starbucks k cups, why won't the machine allow me to make that?  answer: manufacturer greed.
product_name: Keurig K475 Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker with 12oz Brew Size

I want a someone to contact me back about sending this product back. I am very disappointed in the this k475 maker. The screen keeps coming up saying under presure . I used the devise that came with instructions on how to fix it when this message comes up. It still want work. I have lost all my patients with this pot. please contact me about getting my money back.
